response.overview: When a Grail hunter uncovers a message from his future self, he’s pulled into a terrifying web of conspiracies, secret codes, and simulated reality. Starring John Altman, The Grail Code: Revelation Zero is Kubrick’s nightmare reborn for the digital ag
response.tagline: is life a simulation controlled by the Illuminati?
response.title: The Grail Code: Revelation Zero
